Package src.Actions

Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddBalanceAction, AddBookingAction, ConfirmAction, DisplayBookingAction, ExitAction, RemoveBookingAction, ViewBalanceAction
public interface Action
This is an Action interface that represents an action that can be executed by a user in the booking system. It provides two methods: execute and menuDescription.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    execute(User user, BookingSystem bookingSystem)
    Executes the action for a given user in the booking system.
    String
    menuDescription()
    Returns a string representing the description of the action.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      String execute(User user, BookingSystem bookingSystem)
      Executes the action for a given user in the booking system.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is executing the action
      bookingSystem - the booking system in which the action is being executed
      Returns:
      a string representing the result of the action execution

    • menuDescription

      String menuDescription()
      Returns a string representing the description of the action.
      Returns:
      a string representing the description of the action
